about_the_game:
30 minutes of hard work have passed, and it's finally time for a well-deserved break!

Your objective is simple: brew some delicious coffee with the stuff your crew stored inside your spaceship. A task rather simple if you squeeze your brain and think about it.

It would be terrible, however, if your colleague connected the wrong red button to the USA nuclear arsenal launch sequence and your daughter is joyfully going to school, completely unaware of it

Relax in the chill atmosphere of deep space, while playing this short-and-sweet Point and Click Puzzle game: you only need your dominant hand (or hook, if you are a space pirate) and a mouse to navigate through the playful systems of the game.

Brace yourself, here are some of them:

  • Multiple Endings: 11 Bad Endings are hidden, for you to avoid them!

  • Lots of hints are scattered as notes and other secrets, for you to find them!

  • Franco.

  • Epic Interactions: grab and toss around the items your crew left around in the spaceship, with custom sounds and properties

  • Revolutionary liquids mixing system (source: trust me, bro).

  • Original Radio Stations, achievements and much more!

Other cool features included:

  • Real time text translation from Russian

  • Cool space squids

  • Betrayals, tears and drama

  • 64% accurate solar system representation

  • "More moons in Earth's orbit" FREE DLC

    "Coffee Break was first developed by the craziest AIV students during the Virtualverse, a Game Jam where the top game development schools of Italy battle to the Death for fame and glory.

    It was a tough clash, but Coffee Break came out as the winner, bringing home three of the available five prizes, including best game overall."

short_description: It's time for a well-deserved break from your space-engineering stuff. Unravel the functioning of your freshly repaired coffee machine, while trying not to destroy the Earth. The fate of all humanity lies on your mug!
